comment.author: 62760997@N05
comment._content: Remember pea soupers well when you literally couldn't see your hand in front of your face.  The killer smog in 1952 kept me and my family in Malta for an extra two weeks because planes couldn't land in London (not on holiday - stationed at Hal Far)
